name: Stable Diffusion
description: Generate images from text, init image and mask image with Latent Diffusion LAION-400M.
license_html:
The model is licensed with a CreativeML Open RAIL-M license. The authors claim no rights on the outputs you generate, you are free to use them and are accountable for their use which must not go against the provisions set in this license. The license forbids you from sharing any content that violates any laws, produce any harm to a person, disseminate any personal information that would be meant for harm, spread misinformation and target vulnerable groups. For the full list of restrictions please read the license

Biases and content acknowledgment

Despite how impressive being able to turn text into image is, beware to the fact that this model may output content that reinforces or exacerbates societal biases, as well as realistic faces, pornography and violence. The model was trained on the LAION-5B dataset, which scraped non-curated image-text-pairs from the internet (the exception being the removal of illegal content) and is meant for research purposes. You can read more in the model card

inputs.label: API Version
inputs.description: Used to add a warning to ask to update the backend when the API changes

inputs.label: Prompt
inputs.description: try adding increments to your prompt such as 'oil on canvas', 'a painting', 'a book cover'

inputs.label: Image
inputs.description: Initial image for inpainting or img to img

inputs.label: Mask
inputs.description: Initial image for inpainting or img to img

inputs.label: Number of Images
inputs.description: How many images you wish to generate

inputs.label: Steps
inputs.description: More steps can increase quality but will take longer to generate

inputs.label: Strength
inputs.description: How close we should follow the initial image

inputs.label: Guidance scale
inputs.description: How closely we should follow the prompt

inputs.label: Seeds
inputs.description: Comma separated list of numbers to generate initial latent images. Random if empty

inputs.label: Access code
inputs.description: Optional access code for the backend
